articles.author: Brian Windhorst
articles.title: Kevin Durant powers Team USA's rout of Czech Republic on record night - ESPN
articles.description: On a night when he became the all-time leading American scorer in the Olympics, Kevin Durant added another tremendous performance to his Team USA resume in a 119-84 victory over the Czech Republic.
articles.content:
SAITAMA, Japan -- The best thing Team USA had going for it this summer was Kevin Durant committing to play. On Saturday, he reminded everyone why.

articles.title: Delta variant produces similar viral loads in vaccinated, unvaccinated: CDC - Business Standard
articles.description: The CDC updated its masking recommendation on Tuesday, urging vaccinated Americans to resume wearing masks in schools and in public indoor spaces in Covid-19 hot spots
articles.content:
A new study of the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) shows the Delta variant produced similar amounts of virus in vaccinated and unvaccinated people if they get infected.
